title: Cucumber apple salad with smoked salmon
ingredients: ['1 large cucumber', '1/2 red onion, minced', '2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and sliced', '3 slices smoked salmon, cut into strips', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons mirin', '2 tablespoons Demerara sugar', '3 teaspoons freshly grated root ginger', '2 tablespoons lime juice']
